title: Re-enactments
medium: Two-channel synchronized video installation composed of two projected videos (color, sound)
credits: Gift of The Speyer Family Foundation, Kathy and Richard S. Fuld, Jr., Marie-Josée and Henry R. Kravis, Patricia Phelps de Cisneros, Anna Marie and Robert F. Shapiro, Julia Stoschek Foundation, Düsseldorf, and Committee on Media Funds
